attributes.action: Restore capital punishment for the murder of children
attributes.additional_details: As an ultimate deterrent. To relieve the financial burden on the state. To demonstrate that the people of this nation do not, and will never accept violence perpetrated against our children.
attributes.background: Restore capital punishment as a sentencing option for child murder where the evidence of (perpetrator(s)) guilt is irrefutable.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Bring back the death penalty for homicide of a child
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/709710
